sense.gloss: whole year, all year round, throughout the year
middle class (of a nursery school, etc.)

sdata.j: ↑沖縄↑↓おきなわ↓は１|↑年↑↓ねん↓↑中|↑↓ちゅう↓よい↑気候↑↓きこう↓だ。
